meanings.definition: A pattern of diamond-shaped areas of different colors on a solid background.
meanings.sent1: The argyll on his sweater was made up of colorful diamonds.
meanings.sent2: She admired the argyll design on the tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: The argyll pattern on the wall seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The argyll of the quilt resembled a field of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The argyll stood out vividly against the plain fabric.

meanings.definition: A knitted pattern of diamonds in two or more colors.
meanings.sent1: Grandma knitted a cozy sweater with an intricate argyll.
meanings.sent2: The socks had a classic argyll design that never goes out of style.
meanings.sent3: The argyll on the scarf made it look like a rainbow wrapped around her neck.
meanings.sent4: The argyll on the hat sparkled like a constellation in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The argyll pattern added a touch of elegance to the gloves.
